snippet: Despite his surprisingly straightforward approach to acting, the man who will soon play both Macbeth and Steve Jobs is full of contradictions. On the road with film’s magnetic outsider.
abstract: Profile of German-Irish actor Michael Fassbender, who has forged unlikely path to Hollywood fame by portraying outsiders; among his many coming projects, he will be playing starring role in Danny Boyle biopic Steve Jobs.

byline.contributor: Hair by Paul Hanlon at Julian Watson Agency. Grooming by Aaron de Mey at Art Partner. Set design by Bette Adams for Mary Howard Studio. Producer: Dawn Boller. Tailor: Anna Oukdova. Photo assistants: Chris Domurat, Jeff Tautrim, Sean Jackson, Ryan Brinkmann and Jonathan White. Stylist’s assistants: Carlos Nazario and Gerry O’Kane. Hair assistant: Andrea Martinelli. Makeup assistant: Tayler Treadwell. Set assistant: Graham Huber

lead_paragraph: Despite his surprisingly straightforward approach to acting, the man who will soon play both Macbeth and Steve Jobs is full of contradictions. On the road with film’s magnetic outsider.
